data.actual_result: We can't move the channel in the category if there's one category.
data.expected_result: We can move the channel in the category
data.short_description: [Android 5.1 specific] We can't move the channels in a category if there's only one
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server (it's easier). - Delete every categories. - Create a new category. - Server Settings > Channels > Text Channels > Try move a channel in the new category
